Layout/SpaceBeforeBlockBraces.description:
Description

Checks that the left block brace has or doesn't have space before it.
Layout/SpaceBeforeBlockBraces.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: space (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyleForEmptyBraces: space (type: str)
SupportedStylesForEmptyBraces: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
